replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
[创世]CleanroomGenerator V1.0.0 —— 自定义超平坦世界生成器[1.7-1.4.7]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-102559-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)原帖去下载https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/cleanroomgenerator/files
做一个水的超平坦世界。命令应该是这样
mvcreate cleanroom normal -g CleanroomGenerator:10,water
